Package no.brunostengine

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
no.brunostengine.Scene
public class Scene extends Object
The Scene class is an essential part of the framework, as it represents the in-game world and contains every GameObject meant to be presented to the player or perform actions at any given point.
A Scene can also be seen as the "Level" or "Stage" that a player is meant to go through, but this class also contains important functionality allowing for the in-game world to function.

This class is not meant to be client-created. See the SceneBuilder class for implementing your own Scene.
